SkillRequirement.name: SkillRequirement
SkillRequirement.description: Represents a skill that is required to complete a particular work type.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

RelatedRecordId.description: The record that the skill is required for. The related record is a work type in Automotive Cloud.

SkillLevel.description: he level of the skill required. Skill levels can range from zero to 99.99.

SkillNumber.description: An auto-generated number identifying the skill requirement.
